scenes.description: 택시 안에서 네 여자가 한동안 말없이 숨을 고르는 장면

character_prompts.한정숙: 57 year old Korean woman, breathing deeply, it's real expression

character_prompts.이말자: 53 year old Korean woman, quiet exhale, we did it realization
character_prompts.강순덕: 55 year old Korean woman, starting to grin

scenes.description: 네 여자가 함께 웃음을 터뜨리는 장면

character_prompts.최영희: 60 year old Korean woman, genuine laugh, journalist spirit alive
character_prompts.이말자: 53 year old Korean woman, rare full smile, we actually pulled it off
character_prompts.강순덕: 55 year old Korean woman, laughing loudest, pure joy

scenes.description: 영희가 창밖을 보며 '얼마 만에 보는 바깥 풍경이야'라고 말하는 장면

character_prompts.최영희: 60 year old Korean woman, face pressed to window, watching world go by, how long has it been expression, savoring freedom

scenes.description: 정숙이 창문을 열어 바람을 맞는 장면

scenes.main_prompt: masterpiece, best quality, photorealistic, close-up, elderly woman with wind in face, this is the air of freedom realization, tears and smile, profound moment of liberation

character_prompts.한정숙: 57 year old Korean woman, wind-swept face, tears of joy, this is what freedom feels like expression

scenes.description: 택시가 서울 외곽 모텔에 도착하는 장면

scenes.description: 영희가 '이것만으론 부족해, 원본 장부가 필요해'라고 말하는 장면

scenes.description: 정숙이 '내일 밤, 미라 집에 들어간다'고 결심하는 장면
